scripts.dev:ios: pnpm build && npx cap sync && chmod +x shells/run-ios.sh && ./shells/run-ios.sh
scripts.dev:android: pnpm build && npx cap sync && NODE_ENV=development npx cap run android
scripts.build: chmod +x shells/update-version-from-package.sh && ./shells/update-version-from-package.sh && tsc -b && vite build && npx cap sync
